Detailed Description

Represents a list of database columns.

Member Enumeration Documentation

§ t_brackets

enum oos::columns::t_brackets

Enum declaring values on howto interprete the column list

Enumerator
WITH_BRACKETS 

Interpret the columns with surrounding bracktes

WITHOUT_BRACKETS 

Interpret the columns without surrounding bracktes
